name: Sidereum Nox (Demo Version 0.1 WIP)
description:
Currently a WIP build of my new game Sidereum Nox! In this build, you play as Nox, fighting a green slime. After selecting an option, you will enter a real-time battle where you can attack the slime and where the slime attacks you. This is my first build of this game and is more of a POF than anything else. However, please comment if you find any glitches or if you have any improvements to how the game controls/feels. Any advice is appreciated!

Future builds will fix any glitches found in this build, as well as add new battles to select, including a boss battle. The final build will be the demo of the full game, which will include a hub world as well as some story.

How to play:

Left and right arrow keys/AD: Movement

Up arrow/W: Jump

Down arrow + Left or right arrow keys/ S + A or D: Slide

Z: Select/use sword

X: Return

Space: Use shield

UI:

Green bar represents current health.

Blue bar represents current energy.

Selecting energy will bring you to a menu where you can select either sword or shield, at the cost of some energy. You must select one of those in order to use the sword or shield. You won't be able to summon your weapon without energy.

Selecting focus will restore some energy.

Selecting item will currently restore some health. Future builds will have an item menu pop up where you can select an item, but for now it just restores health.

Selecting escape does nothing currently, however in future builds you will be able to run away from battle.
